pricing.heading: Simple pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works for you

items.question: How does it work?
items.answer: Our platform integrates seamlessly with your existing tools and workflows, making it easy to get started in minutes.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalties or fees.

items.question: Do you offer support?
items.answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 support for all plans, with priority support available on higher tiers.
